edu.neu.ccs.cs5010.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccs.cs5010.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Object class to store the playerData. Including playerName, the playerImpl's scorecard. set of dice and the total score.
